Class SelfEvaluationController

SelfEvaluationController Controls the self evaluation behavior

  • Method Details

    • submitselfeval

      @RequestMapping("/selfeval/{id}") public Object submitselfeval(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redir)
      submitselfeval Generates a form from the user to to fill out and submit as a self evaluation
      Parameters:
      id - is the reviewee id
      authentication - contains the user details
      model - is the a model object use to add attributes to a web page The model attributes eval: is the evaluator template which will be either be a new blank template or if the evaluator has all ready started one it will be the previously saved template id: is the reviewee id
      redir - is the a RedirectAttributes model object use to add attributes to a Redirect web page
      Returns:
      selfevalformedit page

    • viewselfeval

      @RequestMapping("/viewselfeval/{id}/{type}") public Object viewselfeval(@PathVariable("id") long id, @PathVariable("type") String type, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      viewselfeval lets user view self evaluation
      Parameters:
      id - is the reviewee id
      type - is who is viewing the self evaluation
      authentication - contains the user details
      model - is the a model object use to add attributes to a web page The model attributes eval: is the evaluator template which will be either be a new blank template or if the evaluator has all ready started one it will be the previously saved template id: is the reviewee id address: holds the back address
      Returns:
      preview_eval

    • saveselfEvalForm

      @RequestMapping("/save_selfeval/{id}") public String saveselfEvalForm(@Validated Evaluation eval, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult results, @RequestParam(value="response",required=false) String[] response, @RequestParam(value="completed",required=true) boolean completed, @PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redir) throws Exception
      saveselfEvalForm method used to save self evaluation
      Parameters:
      eval - is the evaluation object
      response - is an array that hold the answer for question the the user answered
      completed - is a boolean variable that determines if the sue is saving or submitting their evaluatio
      id - hold the id of the self evaluation
      authentication - is the user details
      model -
      redir - is the a RedirectAttributes model object use to add attributes to a Redirect web page
      Returns:
      either redirect you to "redirect:/myeval" if your saving for later or "redirect:/selfeval/" + id if your miss information
      Throws:
      Exception
